name: Rhythmic HEX
description:
There are too much colorful arrows that are moves to the center from four sides. You need to press WASD buttons when they are approaching pink hexagon in the center.  

Controls: WASD to hit arrows

Made for Trijam#212 Theme: Too much

Tools: Unity Engine, Visual Studio Code, Adobe Illustrator.

Music: "Moon Base" by Context Sensitive, link to the track:
